messages.title: A MESSAGE FROM CRAIG HOY
messages.content: This time, more than ever, your vote matters. So much depends on the outcome of the election here in East Lothian.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The only way to beat the SNP here in East Lothian and stop Nicola Sturgeon and Jeremy Corbyn

issues.governance: The union of 300 years is threatened as never before.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am the only candidate who can beat the SNP here.

quotes.text: Nicola Sturgeon has said she will demand another independence referendum, which she says she has strong and solid mandate for.
Jeremy Corbyn has said we won't stand in the way of another independence referendum and will look at it when the time comes.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The stakes could not be higher. I hope your votes this time to stop the SNP.
